Name.BusinessNameLine1: ABUNDANT LIVING ADULT DAY SERVICES INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PROVIDING ADULT DAY CARE TO AN AGING POPULATION OF ROWAN COUNTY, NORTH CAROLINA
IRS990.MissionDescription: PROVIDING ADULT DAY CARE TO AN AGING POPULATION OF ROWAN COUNTY, NORTH CAROLINA
IRS990.Description: Abundant Living Adult Day Care, Inc. enables frail older adults and adults with disabilities to remain at home and in the community through the use of supportive services. Participants receive healthcare during the day, while caregivers are at work or at rest. Program attendance enriches the lives of older adults by preventing the social isolation that sometimes results from age, infirmity or geography. Participation alleviates loneliness and isolation while promoting health, wellness, and good nutrition. Purposeful activity fills hands and minds idled by poor health and boredom.Day care also provides families with opportunities for a break from caregiving responsibilities; family members can work or rest while loved ones enjoy activities and companionship. A registered nurse, certified nursing assistants, and activity personnel offer medical monitoring, assistance with personal care, and purposeful activity in a safe, secure, and supportive environment. People with Alzheimer's disease and other types of dementia are served.Certified by the Department of Health and Human Services Division of Aging, Abundant Living Adult Day Services is a United Way agency. During the year ended September 30, 2010, ALADS provided 8,391 days of service to 117 residents.

AddressUS.AddressLine1: 1416 S MARTIN LUTHER KING JR AVENUE

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Effective October 1, 2009, the Organization implemented the new accounting requirements associated with uncertainty in income taxes using the provisions of Financial Accounting Standards Board ("FASB") ASC 740, Income Taxes. Using that guidance, tax positions initially need to be recognized in the financial statements when it is more-likely-than-not the positions will be sustained upon examination by the tax authorities. It also provides guidance for derecognition, classification, interest and penalties, accounting in interim periods, disclosure and transition. As of September 30, 2010, the Organization has no uncertain tax positions that qualify for either recognition or disclosure in the financial statements.
NET ASSETS RELEASED FROM RESTRICTIONS USED FOR OPERATIONS: 3998.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 3
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: LSA MANAGEMENT, INC., PROVIDES MANAGEMENT SERVICES FOR LSA AFFILIATES

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD RECEIVES THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO THE FILING DEADLINE IN ORDER TO REVIEW. REVIEW IS DOCUMENTED IN THE JANUARY MINUTES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, ALL BOARDS RECEIVE A COPY OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND THE POLICY IS REVIEWD AT A REGULARLY SCHEDULED BOARD MEETING. EACH MEMBERS SIGNS A STATEMENT INDICATING THEIR COMPLIANCE WITH THE POLICY. WHEN NEW MEMBERS JOIN THE BOARD MID-TERM, THEY ALSO RECEIVE THIS INFORMATION AND COMPLETE THE SAME STATEMENTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL COMPENSATION LIMITS ARE COMPARED TO STATE AND NATIONAL RANGES BASED ON FACILITY SIZE AND EXPERIENCE OF STAFF. THE BOARD APPROVES THE COMPENSATION OF THE PRESIDENT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORMS ARE POSTED ON GUIDESTAR AND AVAILABLE AT THE LSA OFFICE LOCATED IN SALISBURY, NC.
THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE FUNCTIONS AS THE AUDIT COMMITTEE AND PERFORMS THE DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES AS INDICATED ON PAGE 12, PART XI, LINE 2C. THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED SINCE LAST YEAR.
